title: The North east: Port of New York
creator_credit: George Silano, Alan Seeger, Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and National Broadcasting Company
brief_description: The Port of New York is a pivotal trade centre, geographically, in world trade. Economically it is the busiest harbour in the world and illustrates the dependence of nations upon the exchange of goods.
